mean_cn: n. 琐事，小事，无价值的东西；蛋糕；  v. 嘲笑，轻视
mean_en: slightly; something that is not valuable or important; a cold dessert (= a sweet dish) made from cake and fruit with wine and/or jelly poured over it, covered with custard and cream
sentence: Losing 100 yuan is merely a trifle to him.
sentence_trans: 丢失100元对他来说只是一件微不足道的事。
